text: 14.81 In order to improve accessibility and increase movement, new development will also be required to follow a street hierarchy that BACK TO POLICIES puts pedestrians and cyclists first and promotes streets as links for movement and as public places in their own right to ensure a strategic, accessible and safe street network across the borough. Development proposals should provide a clear understanding of the street hierarchy in the surrounding area, and also how new streets created by the development will be incorporated into the hierarchy.
